title: Must Read: Former CaaStle CEO Indicted in $300 Million Fashion Rental Fraud Case, New York City's Garment District Faces Threats
description: These are the stories making headlines in fashion on Monday. Christine Hunsicker, former CEO of fashion rental company CaaStle, surrendered to authorities on Friday after the U.S. Attorney's office in Manhattan indicted her on charges of wire fraud, securities fraud, money laundering, making false ...Continue reading
author: Brooke Frischer
